data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who are far from you in Harbour Island. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Harbour Island, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help 3 new simple churches start among the 1,800 people in the state of Harbour Island, Bahamas. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 713 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Harbour Island, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Harbour Island, Bahamas that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 713 believers in Harbour Island to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,087 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Harbour Island, Bahamas and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Harbour Island, Bahamas has a population of 1,800.

We estimate Harbour Island has 713 people who might know Jesus, 987 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 100 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
